ygData.subject: Re: oracle
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh, Lim, don t wait!  The ocean of tears is a nice place to visit, and it contains one of the secrets to obtaining the coveted acumen mask, a quest from the
ygData.messageBody:
Oh, Lim, don't wait! The ocean of tears is a nice place to visit, and it
contains one of the secrets to obtaining the coveted acumen mask, a quest
from the Temple of Solusek Ro.

----- Original Message -----
From: Lim Dul <sevendegrees@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, November 08, 1999 11:26 AM
Subject: [eq_wizards] oracle


> From: "Lim Dul" <sevendegrees@...>
>
> >Is there a quest for the Oracle Robe? I've been searching and searching
> >for
> >info
> on one as I really don't want to have to kill the Oracle to get one >and
> buying
> one is out of the question for me given the status of my bank account.
>
> Well, according to Graffe's site, it says the quest might be broken since
> nobody's really reported to completing it yet. Figures eh? :)
>
> I've yet to visit that island, I think I'll wait a level or two before
> venturing there to get a robe.
>
> -- Lim'Dul
> 30 Wizzie Veeshan
>
> >
